name: aesthetic.computer
description: The header package for the whole aesthetic.computer codebase.

scripts.servers:
echo '
ðŸ“š Backend Bookmarks

Google Cloud VM Instances: https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instances?hl=en&project=aesthetic-computer
Google Cloud Images: https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/images?tab=images&hl=en&project=aesthetic-computer
Cloudflare DNS: https://dash.cloudflare.com/a23b54e8877a833a1cf8db7765bce3ca/aesthetic.computer/dns/records
MongoDB Atlas: https://cloud.mongodb.com/v2/6098f7aa3936234710388890#/clusters
Firebase Cloud: https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0
Digital Ocean Spaces: https://cloud.digitalocean.com/spaces?i=88dc45
Chat Serial Console: https://console.cloud.google.com/compute/instancesDetail/zones/us-west1-a/instances/chat-system/console?port=1&hl=en&project=aesthetic-computer
Docker Cloud Build: https://build.docker.com/accounts/digitpain/builders/aesthetic-platform/cli
'
scripts.code: npm run reset; npm run boot; npm run emacs;
scripts.from-scratch: npm run reset; npm run build-boot-and-edit
scripts.build-boot-and-edit: npm run boot; emacsclient -e '(kill-emacs)'; emacs --daemon --load dotfiles/dot_config/emacs.el && emacsclient -c --eval '(aesthetic-backend)'
scripts.aesthetic:all: concurrently --raw "npm run site" "npm run server:session" "npm run edge" "npm run stripe" "npm run url"
scripts.site: cd system; npm run codespaces-dev; env nogreet=true fish
scripts.stripe-print-micro: cd system; npm run stripe-dev-print-micro; env nogreet=true fish
scripts.stripe-ticket-micro: cd system; npm run stripe-dev-ticket-micro; env nogreet=true fish
scripts.edge.old: concurrently --raw "vercel dev" "http-server edge-stream -p 9000 --cors -c-1 -i --P http://localhost:3000 -S --cert ssl-dev/localhost.pem --key ssl-dev/localhost-key.pem"
scripts.assets:sync:down: aws s3 sync s3://assets-aesthetic-computer system/public/assets --endpoint-url https://sfo3.digitaloceanspaces.com
scripts.assets:sync:up: aws s3 sync system/public/assets s3://assets-aesthetic-computer --endpoint-url https://sfo3.digitaloceanspaces.com --exclude '*.DS_Store' --acl public-read
scripts.session:reset: f() { cd session-server; npx jamsocket backend terminate $1 };f
scripts.session:alive: cd session-server; npx jamsocket backend list
scripts.session:publish: cd session-server; npm run build; npm run deploy
scripts.server:session:logs: f() { cd session-server; npm run watch-prod $1; };f

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
